instruction: In this task, an input sentence is given which can be in the English, Bengali, Filipino, Hindi, Indonesian(Bahasa variant), Japanese, Central Khmer, Lao, Malay, Burmese, Thai, Vietnamese or Chinese languages. input: ສິ່ງທີ່ໄດ້ເກີດໃນຊາຍແດນໄດ້ເປັນການຮັບຜິດຊອບຝ່າຍດຽວ ຂອງພະນັກງານຮູວັນດາທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ.
